member.name: T:Wipcore.eNova.Api.WebApi.Helpers.ComplexModelFilter
member.summary: This class is used to iterate parameters in api calls and setting descriptions for them in swagger. Descriptions are taken from .xml documents. In a perfect world this should work automatically, but in the current version of swagger it does not.
